vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
προσκολλ-άω,
glue on or to, τι πρός τι [Refs 5th c.BC+]:—passive, generally, to be stuck to, stick or cleave to, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; ὑπὸ τοῦ αἵματος προσκολληθῆναι τὴν ῥομφαίαν αὐτοῦ τῇ δεξιᾷ [Refs 1st c.AD+]; of a snail, τοῖς θαμνίσκοις π. [Refs 1st c.AD+]; of a husband, π. τῇ γυναικί [LXX+NT+1st c.AD+]
__II intransitive of style, to be compact, [Refs 1st c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: (passive) to be rallied to, associated with adhere
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
(passive) to be rallied to, associated with adhere
primarily to make to lean upon or against a thing; metaphorically, to join one's self to, follow as an adherent, rally to, associate with Acts 5:36*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 字意:黏著於
2) 與...連合, 忠心投身於..., 信守於...
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 字意:黏着于
2) 与...连合, 忠心投身于..., 信守于...
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: gắn kết; kết hợp với. πρός (G4314) + κολλάω (G2853)
